name: true-claim-insight
description: Remote claims assessment platform for loss adjusters

scripts.prisma:clean: rm -rf packages/prisma-client/prisma/migrations/* && mkdir -p packages/prisma-client/prisma/migrations/initial_schema && pnpm --silent --filter @tci/prisma-client exec prisma migrate diff --from-empty --to-schema-datamodel prisma/schema.prisma --script > packages/prisma-client/prisma/migrations/initial_schema/migration.sql
scripts.setup: pnpm install && cp -n .env.example .env || true && turbo run setup && pnpm docker:up && sleep 5 && pnpm prisma:migrate && pnpm prisma:seed && pnpm prisma:generate && pnpm --filter @tci/shared-types build
scripts.setup:reset: pnpm install && cp -n .env.example .env || true && turbo run setup && pnpm docker:up && sleep 5 && pnpm --filter @tci/prisma-client exec prisma migrate reset --force && pnpm prisma:seed && pnpm prisma:generate && pnpm --filter @tci/shared-types build
